rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0002
rows.name: But we can't afford to give up now.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0003
rows.name:
Indeed. If we give up hope here,
there will be nothing left of Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0004
rows.name:
That'd leave all the people we care
about dead, and a whole bunch of
innocent folk besides.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0006
rows.name:
But we're not in this alone.
Shin, the Iira guys, and everyone
back on Alst are counting on us.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0007
rows.name:
We've run into all kinds of trouble
on the way, but we made it this far.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0008
rows.name:
This may be the most formidable
obstacle yet, but we can surpass it
like any other.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0009
rows.name:
When friends all together,
nothing impossible!

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0010
rows.name: This is it. This is our final battle!

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0011
rows.name:
Let's show him what Drivers and
Blades can do together!
